nodes.text: Vlex Onopin was a human male scientist who served in the Galactic Empire's Tarkin Initiative after graduating from the Magrody Institute of Programmable Intelligence.

Onopin was portrayed by Weston Gavin in the 2016 film Rogue One: A Star Wars Story. He was listed in the end credits as "Engineer", but his name was revealed in Star Wars: Rogue One: The Ultimate Visual Guide, a reference book written by Pablo Hidalgo which was published the same day as the film.
